title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.5 - Notification of intent to close an existing private rail crossing impacting public access to lands open to the public for recreational use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.5 - Notification of intent to close an existing private rail crossing impacting public access to lands open to the public for recreational use

State Regulations
(a) The commissioner shall solicit public
comment on any proposed alteration or closure of an existing private rail
crossing which would impact public access to lands open to the public for
recreational use. The commissioner shall ensure that any such comments received
are considered by the department in any decision to alter or close such a
private rail crossing. (b) The
commissioner shall not close any private rail crossing that provides direct
access to public State recreational lands unless the department, in
consultation with the State agency with jurisdiction over such lands, finds
that there is a reasonable alternative route that maintains such public access
to and the public recreational value of such lands

Notes
